description: Russia's lockdown has thrown businesses into despair and the Kremlin's lack of remedies is causing anger.
title: Coronavirus crisis tests Putin's grip on power in Russia
title_page: Coronavirus crisis tests Putin's grip on power in Russia - BBC News
maintext: But the doors are firmly shut, with a peak to the epidemic still not in sight. Whatever happens, Ms Tatulova will have no further say in how businesses cope: she was removed from a government advisory group following her unscripted exchange with the president.
